description: The 'geometric_shapes' function is designed to generate a variety of geometric shapes with rotation support. It utilizes several libraries such as matplotlib and numpy to create and manipulate these shapes. The function can generate a wide range of geometric shapes including circles, polygons, quadrilaterals, and prisms. It also supports complex figures and composite shapes. The function is designed to be highly customizable, allowing for the creation of unique and varied geometric visualizations. The function is primarily used for educational purposes, helping students visualize and understand complex geometric concepts.

parameters.name: shape_type
parameters.description: Determines the type of geometric shape to be generated. Options include 'circle', 'polygon', 'quadrilateral', 'prism', etc.

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: Determines the rotation of the geometric shape in degrees.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Determines the color of the geometric shape.

stimulus_type_specification.title: Available Images: geometric_shapes
stimulus_type_specification.description: The 'geometric_shapes' function generates a wide range of geometric shapes with customizable rotation and color. The shapes include simple shapes like circles and polygons, as well as complex shapes like composite rectangular prisms and quadrilateral Venn diagrams. The function is designed to help students visualize and understand complex geometric concepts.

details: The function can generate a wide range of geometric shapes including circles, polygons, quadrilaterals, and prisms.
The function also supports complex figures and composite shapes.
The function allows for the customization of the geometric shape's rotation and color.
The function is designed to be highly customizable, allowing for the creation of unique and varied geometric visualizations.

stimulus_type_specification.educational_purpose: The 'geometric_shapes' function serves as an educational tool by helping students visualize and understand complex geometric concepts. By allowing students to manipulate the rotation and color of the shapes, the function also encourages exploration and experimentation.
